overview:
“Alexis Bogaert is senior investment manager with Dexia Private Equity, the private equity division of Dexia Bank Belgium. He has 9 years of private equity experience with focus on start-ups and growth / expansion financing of SME’s as well as restructuring and change of management/ownership issues.

Previously, he worked at Dexia’s SME credit department focusing on international expansion finance for small enterprises and held a position as technology analyst before transitioning to private equity. Mr. Bogaert has a Masters in Criminology and a Masters in International Politics from Leuven University. In addition he holds a masters in corporate finance and financial accountancy and completed the executive programme in Private Equity at Harvard Business School.

Mr. Bogaert holds board seats in various companies and funds in the medical devices, software, industrial manufacturing & services and environmental technology sector; both in Europe and the US.”

(Source: Plugg)
